name: The Lisander Experiment
description:
A small note:

This game is a re-vised prototype of OneWayOut. Previously developed back in 2018. This took the project idea and fleshed it out into a bigger game. In regards with what happens in the future for this project. I'm unsure, as I'm quite happy with ow it turned out. 

The level generation was made with my own Free dungeon generator for unity.

Special thanks to OADoubleA for their let's play!
